title: About
section1: The idea of mmeet was born in 2018.
section2: In the beginning the name was Low√® but because love is something that is inside of us and we can reveal it, the concept was renamed to mmeet which means "meet each other to expose love between".
section3: That‘s why mmeet is so oriented toward real-life meetings and has no chat because everything that happens between us, not online.
section4: We believe you will find here what you are willing to find.
